com.example.criengine.Database

Class DatabaseWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.criengine.Database.DatabaseWrapper

  • public class DatabaseWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper class for the database. This is where the front end is capable of communicating with the back end database.
